comment.author: 22070130@N07
comment._content: Which ocean liner is berthed there?! 4 smoke stacks, could be RMS Aquitania, one of the view in service in 1940: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four_funnel_liner

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content: I think it's quite possible - here's a shot by Raine of the Aquitania down on the wharves, taken at a similar time -- Courtney
